text: Barnesiella viscericola is a Gram-negative, obligately anaerobic, non-spore- forming and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Barnesiella which has been isolated from chicken caecum in Japan. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Barnesiella viscericola at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria described in 2007
title: Barnesiella viscericola
